abstract: Baltimore City's state's attorney Marilyn J Mosby is in bind over losing two convictions in cases against six police officers in 2015 death of Freddie Gray; most recent loss came with acquittal of Officer Edward M Nero on all charges; critics say Mosby had no business lodging murder and other charges against officers in first place, while supporters grow impatient waiting for a conviction.
lead_paragraph: Critics say Marilyn J. Mosby had no business bringing charges against six police officers in the death of Freddie Gray, and her supporters are growing impatient.

headline.main: 2 Trials and No Convictions Put Top Baltimore Prosecutor in a Bind
headline.print_headline: 2 Trials, 0 Convictions: Baltimore Prosecutor Is in a Bind

snippet: Critics say Marilyn J. Mosby had no business bringing charges against six police officers in the death of Freddie Gray, and her supporters are growing impatient.
